Class AttributeQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.efaps.db.AbstractObjectQuery<Object>
      • org.efaps.db.AttributeQuery

  • public class AttributeQuery
extends AbstractObjectQuery<Object>
    Query is used as a nested query for an attribute.
